posts.title: Building my Website using GPT-5 Codex (and some brains)
posts.summary: I created this entire website with a mix of GitHub Copilot, GPT-5 Codex, and my own stubbornness. Here is how the prototypes evolved into the current release.

posts.title: Australian Social Media Ban
posts.summary: I dive deep into why Australia's proposed social media ban for under-16s is such a catastrophic mistake and how it affects everyone.
